TextEng: I am searching for the Words of Power.
Klauth? Who is this Klauth?
What did you say about fire giants?
Prepare to die, wyrm!
I'll be going now.
Me look for Power Words.
Who be Klauth?
What that 'bout giants?
You die now, dragon!
Me go now.
Eggs? Why would I want your eggs?
Text: 알이요? 왜 제가 당신 알을 원하겠어요?

TextEng: I would like to ask you some questions.
Me want ask you questions.
Eggs? Why me want you eggs?
Are there more dragons in the area?
Do you know anything about the Words of Power?
Text: 권능의 언령에 대해 아시는 게 있나요?

TextEng: Is more dragons nearby?
You know 'bout Power Words?
I am honored to give you the wyrm's head, mighty Gorgotha.
Text: 고룡의 머리를 드리게 되어 영광입니다, 위대한 고르고사여.

TextEng: Me happy give head at you dragon.
I thank you for this generous gift, mighty Gorgotha.
Text: 이 관대한 선물 감사합니다, 위대한 고르고사여.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Great Gorgotha, your hoard is as vast as your might. Surely the lives of your offspring are worth more than this?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 위대한 고르고사여, 당신의 보물 더미는 당신의 힘만큼이나 방대합니다. 분명 당신 자손의 목숨은 이것보다 더 가치가 있을 텐데요?

TextEng: You better dig a little deeper into that pile of gold, Gorgotha... or your eggs might not be as safe as you think!
Text: 그 금화 더미를 좀 더 뒤져보는 게 좋을 거야, 고르고사... 아니면 네 알들이 생각만큼 안전하지 않을 수도 있으니까!

TextEng: Me thank you, dragon. You big strong and give good presents!
Text: 고마워, 용아. 너 크고 강하고 좋은 선물 줘!

TextEng: You big, strong dragon with lots big gold. Me save you eggs. Maybe you give more?
Text: 너 크고 강한 용이고 큰 금화 많아. 나 알 구했어. 더 줄래?

TextEng: Give more gold or me smash you eggs!
Text: 금화 더 줘 아니면 나 알 깨버려!

TextEng: Why does Klauth want dragon eggs?
Why don't you just leave the area?
Text: 왜 그냥 이 지역을 떠나지 않으시나요?

TextEng: I could get rid of Klauth for you.
Text: 제가 클라우스를 처치해 드릴 수 있습니다.

TextEng: Why Klauth be want dragon egg?
Why dragon not fly far away and be safe?
Text: 왜 용 멀리 날아가서 안전하게 안 해?

TextEng: Maybe me could kill Klauth for you.
I will do this for you, Gorgotha!
I'd need some kind of payment up front for an undertaking as dangerous as this.
Text: 이렇게 위험한 일을 하려면 선금이 필요할 것 같은데요.

TextEng: Me do this, dragon!
You give gold now or me not do this.
Text: 지금 금화 줘 아니면 나 안 해.

TextEng: Is there anything more you can tell me about Klauth?
Text: 클라우스에 대해 더 말해주실 수 있나요?

TextEng: Me want know more 'bout Klauth?
